markdownRemark.html:
From my post yesterday, Things I Wish I Knew (Coding), I spent the night thinking about ways to implement these greviences. I will share that I have actually been struggling with this problem for a while now. A year ago I started the course "An Introduction to Interactive Programming in Python (Part 1)" by Rice University on Coursera but unfortunately did not finish it...life got in the way at the time. Revisiting learning now, I am not keen on spending $50 a month on it right now. This morning I came across "Python For Everybody" which looks promising! I will be researching more today and talking to coworkers/friends about the ways to continue.

If you have any suggestions, please let me know by sending a message on Twitter!

frontmatter.title: Things I Wish I Knew - Progress
